# [Interview #616: San Diego ComicCon Interview with Suvudu, Entry #8](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=616#8)

#### Shawn Speakman

Well, thank you for your time, Brandon. Is there anything you want to say to your fans out there?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Oh, no. Thank you for supporting me, and thanks for reading.

#### Shawn Speakman

Great. Thank you.
